11.content: You are walking into the Pokemon Center. It is late at night, and Nurse Joy is abut to close up. She does not see you come in. You hide in a storage closet. Five minutes later Nurse Joy closes the Center. You are up all night preparing. She comes in the next morning and you are gone. She does not look in the closet all day. She comes back from taking a three hour walk in the forest to help an injured Pokemon. She comes back in and you are sitting in one of the chairs with someone who had come in to see Nurse Joy to check on his Pokemon. She shows him his Cacnea is doing fine and he leaves. Nurse Joy sits on the seat next to you. "You look tired." you say. "Yes I am. I was just walking for three hours straight." she replies. "Would you like me to rub your feet?" you ask her. "Sure." she says. "But lets go somewhere more private." you say. "Come on, lets go to my house!" she says
11.title: Nurse Joy

111.content:
You and Nurse Joy were on your way back to her house. The sun was setting over the woods and they're appeared to be no one around.

"My body is killing me!" Joy groaned.

A sudden rustle in the bushes caught your attention. The two of you turned towards the noise. There was a strange sound coming from the darkness. You and Nurse Joy took a step back cautiously.

A wild tangela emerged from the bushes. It's googly eyes, which were the only thing visible beneath its thick coat of vines, moved around wildly. It's eyes locked onto Nurse Joy, and Narrowed in anger. Nurse Joy looked down at her foot, which was standing on top of one of the Pokemon's vines.

"I-I'm sorry..." She stuttered, looking glossy-eyed at the pokemon.
The Tangrowth yanked its appendage from underneath Joy's foot, throwing her off balance.

Several blue vines emerged from the creature's body and wrapped themselves around Nurse Joy's body. The vines twisted around her ankles and wrists, and lifted her into the air, turning her upside down. Her cap fell to the ground next to your feet, revealing her pink hair.

You stared in shock, not knowing what to do. Regaining your composure, you began to reach for your pokeballs, when something caused you to stop

The Tangrowth poked a spot on her stomach with one if its vines. Nurse Joy squeaked with laughter.

The Tangrowth paused, only staring at the Pink-haired nurse. Thr next thing that it would do, shocked you both.
111.title: You two get attacked by a wild Pokemon
